caption.title: Variables in mixed-effect Poisson regression analysis (Approach 2)

tr.td: Total number of patient visits given week and county (the offset)
Mean county-specific maximum specific humidity over nine years
Normalized and zero-centered deviations of maximum humidity, i = 0–4 weeks before
Mean county-specific temperature over nine years
Normalized and zero-centered deviations of mean temperature, i = 0–4 weeks before
Mean county-specific solar insolation over nine years
Normalized and zero-centered deviations of mean solar insolation, i = 0–4 weeks before
Mean county-specific solar insolation over nine years
Normalized and zero-centered deviations of mean surface pressure, i = 0–4 weeks before
Mean county-specific total precipitation over nine years
Normalized and zero-centered deviations of mean total precipitation, i = 0–4 weeks before
Mean county-specific average wind speed over nine years
Normalized and zero-centered deviations of average wind speed, i = 0–4 weeks before
Influence from proximity to airports, modeled as human traffic-weighted exponential diffusion from the 30 largest US airports
% of American Indians in the county
% of county population under poverty line
% of county population classified as urban
influenza velocity change in the land neighbors of the county i weeks before the current week
influenza velocity change in the Twitter neighbors of the county i weeks before the current week
influenza velocity change in airport neighbors of the county i weeks before the current week
change in rate of infection in the county itself i weeks from the current
Diversity in M1 protein primary structure
Diversity in M2 protein primary structure

vaccination coverage in the county cumulated over past 20 weeks i weeks from the current
